臉書公司換新商標 字體色彩象徵家族成員
05 Nov 2019, 12:39 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
（中央社舊金山4日綜合外電報導）臉書公司（Facebook Inc.）今天公布新的公司商標，套用象徵「家族成員」的彩色字體，代表這間設於矽谷的公司，以與旗下核心社群網站有所區別。
臉書經營一系列應用程式（app）和服務，其中包括訊息傳遞、照片分享、虛擬實境，同時也在開發數位貨幣使用的電子錢包，推出新商標是為了凸顯臉書「品牌」。
根據臉書行銷長魯西歐（Antonio Lucio）所言，臉書公司新的商標，基本上是以正楷書寫公司的名字，將印在旗下「家族」服務上。
美國有線電視新聞網（CNN）的報導中提到，臉書公司新商標的顏色象徵其家族成員，包括代表臉書的藍色、象徵WhatsApp的綠色，還有Instagram的代表色紫色、紅色與橘色。
魯西歐說：「今天我們更新了我們公司的商標，好讓人更清楚知道來自臉書的產品。」
「我們向大家介紹新的公司商標，並更近一步將臉書公司與臉書app區別開來，而臉書社群網站將保留原本的名稱。」
魯西歐補充道，新的公司商標「是一個更好的溝通方式，以向使用臉書服務連結社群的個人或企業，更清楚展現我們的所有權結構」。
在此同時，臉書公司維護平台內容的方式，受到全球監管機關的嚴格審查，一些政治人物與運動人士企圖分拆這個矽谷巨擘。
臉書是在15年前以社群網路應用程式起家，之後收購了虛擬實境穿戴裝置公司Oculus，和以分享照片為主的社群網路Instagram，臉書還推出智慧螢幕Portal，和為工作場所量身定做的社群網路Workplace。
臉書的傳訊應用程式WhatsApp和Messenger，各自擁有超過10億用戶。
臉書建立了電子錢包Calibra，以搭配擬議發行的加密貨幣Libra使用，但Libra計畫自宣布以來，不斷遭受多國監管機管和立法者批評。（譯者：李晉緯/核稿：張曉雯）1081105

Facebook brand new brand font color symbol family member
05 Nov 2019, 12:39 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
(Central News Agency, San Francisco, 4th, comprehensive foreign news report) Facebook Inc. (Facebook Inc.) today announced a new company logo, using a color font that symbolizes "family members", representing the company based in Silicon Valley, with its core social networking site There is a difference.
Facebook manages a range of applications (apps) and services, including messaging, photo sharing, and virtual reality. It is also developing e-wallets for digital currency, and new trademarks are introduced to highlight Facebook's "brand."
According to Facebook's marketing chief, Antonio Lucio, Facebook's new trademark, basically the name of the company, will be printed on its "family" service.
According to CNN's report, the color of Facebook's new trademark symbolizes its family members, including blue for Facebook, green for WhatsApp, and purple, red and orange for Instagram. color.
Lucio said: "Today we have updated our company's trademarks so that people can know more about products from Facebook."
"We introduce the new company logo to you and further differentiate Facebook and Facebook apps, and the Facebook community website will retain its original name."
Lucio added that the new company trademark "is a better way to communicate with individuals or businesses that use Facebook to connect with the community to better articulate our ownership structure."
At the same time, Facebook’s way of maintaining platform content has been scrutinized by global regulators, and some politicians and activists have attempted to spin off the Silicon Valley giants.
Facebook started as a social networking app 15 years ago, and then acquired Oculus, a virtual reality wearables company, and Instagram, a community-based social network that shares photos. Facebook also launched Smart Portal, and Workplace tailored social network Workplace.
Facebook's messaging apps, WhatsApp and Messenger, each have more than 1 billion users.
Facebook has built the e-wallet Calibra to work with the proposed cryptocurrency Libra, but the Libra project has been criticized by multinational regulators and legislators since its announcement. (Translator: Li Jinwei / Nuclear Release: Zhang Xiaowen) 1081105
